trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> and <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> classes.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref uid="langword_csharp_EmulateRecognizeCompleted" name="EmulateRecognizeCompleted" href=""> </xref> az esemény a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> és <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> osztályok.

trans-unit.source: An instance of EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs példánya létrejön, amikor a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum vet fel a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted>esemény.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.EmulateRecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the result of recognition, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Felismerés eredményét kapcsolatos információkhoz, nyissa meg a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>a kezelő a következő eseményhez: a tulajdonság.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>

trans-unit.source: Emulation is the process by which text, instead of audio, is the input to a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Emuláció az a folyamat, amellyel szöveg helyett hang, a beszédfelismerés bemeneti.

trans-unit.source: To bypass the audio inputs for a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object during emulation, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: A hangbemenetek a elkerülésére egy <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objektum során emulációjára, használja a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A>metódus.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SetInputToNull%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: If the speech recognition engine encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a beszédfelismerés tapasztal kivétel történt a felismerési művelet során a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>tulajdonsága a kivétel és a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A>tulajdonsága `null`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs.Result%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult> object derives from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>objektum származik <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase>és a felismerési művelet által visszaadott kifejezés teljes információt tartalmaz.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognizedPhrase> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ezt úgy szerezheti be a felismerési jelöltek ki listáját a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.RecognitionResult.Alternates%2A>

trans-unit.source: If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the Result property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ha a felismerő felismerést művelet során kivétel észlel a <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>tulajdonsága a kivételt, és az eredmény tulajdonsága `null`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if an error occurred.
trans-unit.target: Részletes információkat felismerés eredményeit vagy <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> hiba esetén.
